title: Vehicle
description: Response object from a vechicle creating request. Endpoint: https://api.route4me.com/api.v4/vehicle.php

status.title: Status
status.descrption: The status of the finished request - if true, a vehicle created successfully

vehicle_guid.title: Vehicle Guid
vehicle_guid.descrption: An unique identifier of the created vehicle (32-char)

new.title: New
new.description: If true, the created vehicle is new
